title.narrative: Water supply and environmental sanitation Hajjah Governorate (Phase II).

description.narrative: Preserving the lives of the displaced and citizens by continuing to secure safe and healthy sources of water in the gathering areas of the displaced in Hajjah Governorate (Hayran / Midi / Abs) / Drainage of waste and waste in a safe and healthy manner / Preventive maintenance of water tanks, sewage and toilets / Raise awareness of citizens and displaced persons

Save life and maintain its continuity, limit the spread of diseases and epidemics, and secure a safe and healthy environment for the displaced and citizens by providing basic services in the water and environmental sanitation sector through the maintenance of wells and pumps and the establishment of a drinking water desalination plant.

_ The ability of a number of water wells to pump and maintain water and provide sustainable water solutions _ Pumping and distributing 15,120,000 liters of potable water and the same for domestic use Limiting the spread of diseases and epidemics for the displaced and citizens to (800) families _ Preserving the dignity of the human being by securing his water needs and preserving the lives of (800) families _ Provide and maintain water tanks and their surroundings, the safety of septic tanks, prevent leaks, provide toilets, maintain a safe and sound environment, and sustain project activities with their periodic maintenance. _ Provide places designated for placing, collecting and disposing of waste in a safe, healthy and environmentally friendly manner while limiting the spread of rodents and disease vectors and spreading awareness among the displaced in a clean, healthy environment
